</ol>

} else { wnd = window.open( oUrl, "essb_share_window", "height=500,width=800,resizable=1,scrollbars=yes,top="+top+",left="+left ); } if (typeof(essb_settings) != "undefined") { if (essb_settings.essb3_stats) { if (typeof(essb_handle_stats) != "undefined") { essb_handle_stats(oService, instance_post_id, oInstance);
